item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:17, topic:431458”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=534136.msg3905824#msg3905824 date=1328224080]

       if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")
          || playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) {
      if (c.playerRights == 9 || c.playerRights == 5
         || c.playerRights == 6) {
          return;
      }
      String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
      if (args.length == 3) {
          int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
          int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
          for (int i : restrictedItems) {
         if (i == newItemID) {
             c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!");
             return;
         }
          }
          if (newItemID >= 15753 || newItemID <= 17362) {
         c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!");
         return;
          }
          if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
         c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
          } else {
         c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
          }
      } else {
          c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:::(item_ID_Amount:(:(item 995 1))");
      }
       }

^That’s fixed

But I would just add the ID’s into the array…

Next one, and i’m reporting for spoonfeeding.

//off subject, do you have the same name in the real RS?

ye i got perm ban, but i got a diff acc
[/quote]

ah, i met u a while back on there. i think i PK-ed with you or something, lol[/quote]
uhh runescape or rune0000sserver… pm me reply…

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:13, topic:431458”] if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") || playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) { if (c.playerRights == 9 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 6) { return; } String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for (int i : restrictedItems) { if (i == newItemID) { c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!"); return; } } if (newItemID >= 15753 || newItemID <= 17362) { c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!"); return; } if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:::(item_ID_Amount:(:(item 995 1))"); } }
^That’s fixed

But I would just add the ID’s into the array…[/quote]

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

	    if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")
		    || playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) {
		if (c.playerRights == 9 || c.playerRights == 5
			|| c.playerRights == 6) {
		    return;
		}
		String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
		if (args.length == 3) {
		    int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		    int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		    for (int i : restrictedItems) {
			if (i == newItemID) {
			    c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!");
			    return;
			}
		    }
		    if (newItemID >= 15753 || newItemID <= 17362) {
			c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!");
			return;
		    }
		    if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
			c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		    } else {
			c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
		    }
		} else {
		    c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:::(item_ID_Amount:(:(item 995 1))");
		}
	    }

^That’s fixed

But I would just add the ID’s into the array…

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

try this…

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
if (c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“you can’t spawn items in the wilderness!”);
return;
}
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
// add restricted items here.
int restrictedItems[] = {15753,17362};

                                            for (int i : restrictedItems) {
                                            if (i == newItemID) {
                                                    if (c.playerRights != 3 && c.playerRights != 2) {
                                                            c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item!");
                                                    return;
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    }
                            if ((newItemID <= 20072) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
                                    c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                            } else {
                                    c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item!");
                            }
                            } else {
                                    c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
                            }
                            } catch(Exception e) {
                    }}[/code]

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“StubernSnake, post:1, topic:431458”][code]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)||playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”))

{
    try
    {
        if (c.playerRights == 9 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 6)
        {
            return;
        }
        String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
        if (args.length == 3)
        {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
            for(int i : restrictedItems) {
                if(i == newItemID) {
                    c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!");
                    return;
                }
            }
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
            if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0))
            {
                c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else
            {
                c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist. Try ::getid ex. Dragon");
            }
        } else
        {
            c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:::(item_ID_Amount:(:(item 995 1))");
        }
    } catch (Exception e)
    {

    }
}[/code]

I want to add this :

if(item >= 15753 && item <= 17362) {//some dung items c.sendMessage("You may not spawn this item."); return; }
I tried by editing it :

int item = Integer.parseInt(args[0]); if(item >= 15753 && item <= 17362) {//some dung items } c.sendMessage("You may not spawn this item."); } else { c.sendMessage("You spawn an item."); } } catch (Exception e) {

I get 100 errors.

[code]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)||playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”))

{
    try { 

int item = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
if(item >= 15753 && item <= 17362) {//some dung items	
}
    c.sendMessage("You may not spawn this item.");
    } else
        {
            c.sendMessage("You spawn an item.");
        }
    } catch (Exception e)

                    }
        if (c.playerRights == 9 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 6)
        {
            return;
        }
        String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
        if (args.length == 3)
        {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
            for(int i : restrictedItems) {
                if(i == newItemID) {
                    c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!");
                    return;
                }
            }
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
            if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0))
            {
                c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else
            {
                c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist. Try ::getid ex. Dragon");
            }
        } else
        {
            c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:::(item_ID_Amount:(:(item 995 1))");
        }
    } catch (Exception e)
    {

    }
}	[/code]

Help is appreciated :)[/quote]

Read full topic

            if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0))
            {
                c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else
            {
                c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist. Try ::getid ex. Dragon");
            }
        } else
        {
            c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:::(item_ID_Amount:(:(item 995 1))");
        }
    } catch (Exception e)
    {

    }
}	[/code]
